title: Idaho Medicaid Pharmacy Program
cleaned_text: The goal of the Idaho Medicaid Pharmacy Program is to provide quality care to Medicaid participants with the most effective drug at the right price. [Magellan Medicaid Administration](https://idaho.fhsc.com/), Inc. is the Idaho Medicaid Pharmacy Benefit Management contractor.
